name: Little Forests
description:
WASD to move.

Left click to throw axe.

Little Forests is a little game me and Samina Trachier made to support TeamTrees.org. The game was made in 48 hours and was about protecting and planting trees for the betterment of the environment. 

Samina's Itch:

https://saminatrachier.itch.io/
